You’re right, it looks like

I got a little too upset.

Prepare to finish

the survey work

and then return

to England.

We’re so happy to hear you say that, Captain.

Yeah!

Captain,

you’re the

best!

As soon as the Beagle arrived in Chile, the fully recovered Darwin joined them.

From the deck of the Beagle, Darwin intently observed

a volcanic eruption.

The power of nature is truly incredible.

109
